name: Happy Island Life
storyline: You, who lived freely on the island, originally lived a leisurely life of hunting wild boars and occasionally harassing the savages. But your life has changed since you rescued the beautiful lady who was stranded on the island in a plane accident.
summary: Collect materials and supplies scattered on the map to create equipment to fight against danger and tools to collect trees and minerals; build and upgrade your housing, manufacture the necessities for survival, and build your housing into a cozy cabin. Please keep an eye on your hunger, thirst, and blood levels for you and your partner at all times, the game will be over once your blood level reaches zero.
